column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Fa Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no ka no ho
column7: nye bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no
column11: "na mboanofo no nyinara mbɔ ngua wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano."

column2: "Na Moses yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no; na mboanofo bɔɔ ngua wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano."
"Na Moses see mboanofo no dɛ
column3: Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE ahyɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ."

column2: "Na Moses dze Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no bae
column3: na ɔdze nsu hohoor hɔn ho."

column2: "Na ɔdze sortar no hyɛɛ no
column3: na ɔdze abɔyamu no bɔɔ no do
column4: na ɔdze bataker no hyɛɛ no
column5: na ɔdze egugudo no guu no
column6: na ɔdze egugudo ne nkyermu nkyekyermu no bɔɔ no do

column2: "Na ɔdze akatabo no hyɛɛ no: na ɔdze Urim nye Tummim (Kan na Emudzi) no hyɛɛ akatabo no mu."
"Na ɔdze asɔfokyɛw no hyɛɛ ne tsir: na ɔdze sika abɔtsir
column3: abɔenyim krɔnkrɔn no
column5: wɔ n’enyim afamu; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na Moses faa ɔserango
column3: na ɔdze seraa ntamadan no nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara

column2: "Na ɔdze bi petsee afɔrmbukyia no do mpɛn esuon
column3: na ɔseraa afɔrmbukyia no nye no ho ndzɛmba nyinara
column4: nye eguarsɛn no nye ne ntaease no ngo dze yɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na ohuee ɔserango no bi guu Aaron n’etsifi
column3: na ɔseraa no ngo dze yɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na Moses dze Aaron mbabanyin no bae
column3: na ɔdze sorntar hyehyɛɛ hɔn
column4: na ɔdze abɔyamu bobɔɔ hɔn do
column5: na ɔdze abɔtsir bobɔɔ hɔn; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na ɔdze bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no bae: na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dze hɔn nsa guu bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no n’etsifi."
"Na Moses kum no; na ɔdze ne nsatseaba faa mbɔgya no bi
column3: na ɔdze kekaa afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn ho hyiae
column5: na ohuee bɔgya no guu afɔrmbukyia no ase

column2: "Na ɔfaa seradze a ɔwɔ ayamudze no ho no nyinara
column3: nye berɛbo do ntentan no
column6: na Moses hyeew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na ɔnantwisaa no
column3: nye no nwoma
column6: ɔdze ogya hyeew no wɔ nseraban no ekyir; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na ɔdze ɔhyew afɔr oguannyin no bae: na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin dze hɔn nsa guu oguannyin no etsifi."
"Na Moses kum no: na ɔdze bɔgya no petsee afɔrmbukyia no do hyiae."
"Na otwitwaa oguannyin no mu esinesin; na ɔhyeew tsir no
column3: nye esinesin no

column2: "Na ɔdze nsu hohoor ayamudze nye ntwɛr no ho; na afei ɔhyeew oguannyin mu no nyinara wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: ɔyɛ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam: ɔyɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
"Na ɔdze oguannyin kor no so
column3: etuhoakyɛ afɔr oguannyin no
column4: bae: na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dze hɔn nsa guu oguannyin no etsifi."

column2: "Na Moses kum no; na ɔfaa no bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na ɔdze kaa Aaron n’aso nyimfa ano
column5: nye ne nan nyimfa kokonyin no ano."

column2: "Na ɔdze Aaron mbabanyin no bae
column3: na Moses dze bɔgya no bi kekaa hɔn aso nyimfa ano
column5: nye hɔn anan nyimfa kokonyin no ano: na Moses dze bɔgya no petsee afɔrmbukyia no do hyiae."

column2: "Na ɔfaa seradze no
column3: nye seradze dua no

column2: "na ɔfaa epitsi boodoo kɛntsɛn a osi EWURADZE enyim no mu epitsi tatar kor
column3: nye ngo boodoo tatar kor
column5: na ɔdze guu seradze no nye aserɛ nyimfa no do:"

column2: "na ɔdze ne nyinara hyɛɛ Aaron na ne mbabanyin no nsa
column3: na ɔtowee yɛɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na Moses gyee no wɔ hɔn nsamu
column3: na ɔhyeew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do wɔ ɔhyew afɔr no do: dze yɛɛ etuhoakyɛ afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam: ɔyɛ ogya afɔr ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Moses faa nyan no
column3: na ɔtowee yɛɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim: ɔyɛ Moses ne kyɛfa wɔ etuhoakyɛ afɔr oguannyin no mu; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no ara."

column2: "Na Moses faa ɔserango no bi
column3: nye afɔrmbukyia no do bɔgya no bi
column7: nye ne mbabanyin ntar do; dze yɛɛ Aaron nye ne ntar

column2: "Na Moses see Aaron
column3: nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column4: Hom nnoa nam no wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano: na hom ndzi no wɔ hɔ ara ɔnye etuhoakyɛ afɔr kɛntsɛn no mu boodoo no."

column2: "Na nam no nye boodoo no mu dza ɔbɛka no hom mfa gya nhyew no."
"Na mma hom mmfi ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano nda esuon
column3: kyerɛ hom etuhoakyɛ afɔr nda no aso ana: na nda esuon na ɔdze rutu hom akyɛ."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ wɔayɛ no ndɛ da yi no
column3: dɛmara na EWURADZE ahyɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ mfa mpata mma hom."

column2: "Na hom ntsena ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano adzekyee nye adzesaa nda esuon
column3: na hom nhwɛ EWURADZE ahwɛdze no
column4: amma hom eennwuwu: na dɛm na wɔdze ahyɛ me mbra."

column2: "Na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no yɛɛ ndzɛmba a EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do hyɛe no nyinara."
